event.descr: Online Ellipse Server is currently experiencing high CPU utilisation. This can indicate an issue with the JVM requiring a restart of the JVM This should be investigated to determine if JVM restart is required. Service: %service% Datasource: %parm[ds]% Interface: %interface% parms: %parm[all]%
event.logmsg: High threshold exceeded for %service% datasource %parm[ds]% on interface %interface%, parms: %parm[all]%
